full_summary:
**Title**: M-55, IRAP 2nd Floor Renewal
**Reference Number**: cb-4568-72276830
**Amendment Number**: 8
**Solicitation Number**: 22-58155
**Public Date**: April 4, 2023
**Closing Date and Time**: May 16, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date**: May 1, 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date**: May 23, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: August 31, 2023
**Tender Status**: Cancelled

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the renovation of the 2nd floor of Building M-55, located at the Montreal Road Campus in Ottawa, ON. The proposed scope of work includes the fit-up of a kitchenette, open office area, several offices opening onto the open office area, and four boardrooms and meeting rooms.

The proposed contractor must have a minimum of ten (10) years' experience as a general contractor providing construction services comparable to this tender. The contractor must supply a company profile and relevant history, as well as two project examples including approximate value of work and a client reference. The proposed construction site supervisor must possess a minimum of 5 years' experience in contract/construction administration, as a site supervisor or similar position, and provide a CV for the proposed supervisor.

Mandatory site visits will be held on April 12th and 13th, 2023 at 9:30 AM. It is mandatory for bidders to attend at least one site visit and sign the Mandatory Site Visit Attendance form prior to leaving the site.

The NRC requires the contractor to meet the following security requirements:

1. Hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD)
2. Ensure all personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS
3. Comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Checklist and the Industrial Security Manual

The contractor must also provide proof of a valid Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB) certificate with their tender or prior to contract award.

The NRC is a leader in scientific research and development, and we expect our contractors to adhere to the highest standards of security, reliability, and quality.

To be eligible to submit a bid, bidders must:

1. Register with the Buyandsell.gc
